code: export var convertNumbers=function convertNumbers(number){if(number){if(number<1000){return number;}else if(number>=1000&&number<1000000){return number.toString().slice(0,-3)+"."+number.toString().slice(-3,-1)+"K";}else if(number>=1000000&&number<1000000000){return number.toString().slice(0,-6)+"."+number.toString().slice(-6,-4)+"M";}else if(number>=1000000000){return number.toString().slice(0,-9)+"."+number.toString().slice(-9,-7)+"B";}}};
